title: ****1 BED in 2 Fam******LAUNDRY & PARKING--BUS
posting_body: Deep Tandem Garage, Driveway and Street Parking

Enjoy outstanding living in this popular split-level home in iconic Westlake #1 has been updated to modern conveniences, only minutes to all amenities that majority of your living necessities are nearly at your fingertips.
Well located in best Westlake # 1 section, midway between metropolitan San Francisco, Silicon Valley to the south and many more favorite Bay Area destinations are within short distance.

The split-level design offers the utmost in privacy and living accommodations with two good sized bedrooms, contemporary full bath with chic wall accessories all on one level in east west orientation.
Fireplace adorns the natural light-filled living room with floor to ceiling windows, trendy ceiling light in bright formal dining room with door division adjoining the kitchen.
Gourmet kitchen beautifully updated with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, ample cabinetry plus a door leads to the side and rear yards.
Immaculate hardwood and tile floors, dual pane windows throughout.
Central gas heating with Honeywell smart thermostat, harmonized interior paint, attached deep tandem garage with interior access and auto opener.
Great curb appeal sitting on the best block in Westlake #1, long driveway and abundance of storage space.
Well-manicured large back yard with green house and raised bed garden great for green thumb enthusiasts.
Generously included refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal, washer, dryer and window treatments.
Very well established, serene and family friendly neighborhood where many desire to live.
Short stroll to hip restaurants, coffee joints, Target, Trader Joe's, Safeway, Home Depot and specialty stores in Westlake Shopping Center.

Highly convenient to Daly City Bart, Pacific Plaza, Stonestown Galleria, Lake Merced, public transit, Skyline Plaza, Serramonte Shopping Center, San Francisco State University, schools, parks, beaches and many more.
Four legendary golf courses are within three miles radius, golfing truly a breeze!
Commuter routes to downtown San Francisco, SFO Airport, Genentech in SSF, Stanford University, Silicon Valley and the greater Bay Area are within easy reach.
A wonderful home for respectful, responsible and professional residents.
Easy to show, call now for a private tour!
Green House with Raised Bed Garden
Deep Tendam Garage with Interior Access
Short Stroll to Westlake Shopping Center: Target, Home Depot, Ross, Joann
Short Distance to Stonestown Galleria: Apple, Boudin, Uniqlo, Marugame Udon, Zara
Near Parks: Westlake Park, Palisades Park & Marchbank Park
Near Schools: Our Lady Mercy School, Westlake Elementary School, Marjorie H. Tobias Elementary School, Benjamin Franklin Intermediate School & Westmoor High School
Close to Golf Courses: The Olympic Club Golf Course, San Francisco Golf Club, TPC Harding Park & Lake Merced Golf Club
Close to Grocery Stores: Trader Joe’s, Safeway, Kukje Super Market, Daly City Market, H Mart, 99 Ranch
Near Restaurants: Original Joe’s, Boulevard Café, Blue Line Pizza, Chipotle, Banana Island, Spiral, Panda Express, Kevin’s Noodles, Ming Yuan Restaurant, Tasty Pot
Near Coffee/Juice/Milk Tea: Starbucks, Truedan, Jamba, YiFang, Meet Fresh, Peet’s, Quickly
Near Beaches: Thornton State Beach, Fort Funston Beach, Ocean Beach
Tenant to pay all utilities including gas, electric, water, sewer and garbage.
To prevent scam or fraud: please “DO NOT” wire and/or pay any funds to anyone in regard to this rental ad without a physical tour of the home.
Winco Investments Inc is acting as the agent for the owner.
Information obtained from sources deemed reliable however its accuracy is not guaranteed.
